languages.text: "Ты хотел сказать Хальбрандт Хвастун, не так ли? Ибо в висах его частенько сплетаются правда и его фантазии?" {n}Ульфар мстительно улыбается со зловредностью, совершенно неприличной для Ангела Императора. Теперь уже приходит черед Хальбрандта краснеть лицом.{/n}

"I think you meant to say Halbrandt the Braggart, no? For his verses often weave together the truth with his own flights of fancy?" {n}Ulfar smiles vindictively, with a viciousness utterly unbecoming of an Angel of the Emperor. Now it is Halbrandt's turn to blush.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты хотел сказать Хальбрандт Хвастун, не так ли? Ибо в висах его частенько сплетаются правда и его фантазии?" {n}Ульфар мстительно улыбается со зловредностью, совершенно неприличной для Ангела Императора. Теперь уже приходит черед Хальбрандта краснеть лицом.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你刚刚想说的是‘吹牛大王’哈尔布兰特，对不对？因为他的史诗除了真相之外，还常常夹杂着他自己的异想天开，没错吧？”{n}乌尔法露出了报复性的微笑，脸上恶毒的表情完全不符合帝皇天使的身份。这次，轮到哈尔布兰特涨红了脸。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think you meant to say Halbrandt the Braggart, no? For his verses often weave together the truth with his own flights of fancy?" {n}Ulfar smiles vindictively, with a viciousness utterly unbecoming of an Angel of the Emperor. Now it is Halbrandt's turn to blush.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你刚刚想说的是‘吹牛大王’哈尔布兰特，对不对？因为他的史诗除了真相之外，还常常夹杂着他自己的异想天开，没错吧？”{n}乌尔法露出了报复性的微笑，脸上恶毒的表情完全不符合帝皇天使的身份。这次，轮到哈尔布兰特涨红了脸。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「『お山の大将』ハルブラントのことを言ってんじゃないよな？あいつの詩は空想の戦闘と本物の戦闘がごっちゃになってるからなあ？」{n}ウルファーは皇帝の天使には全く似合わない、仕返しといわんばかりの悪辣な笑みを浮かべる。今度はハルブラントが顔を真っ赤にする番だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think you meant to say Halbrandt the Braggart, no? For his verses often weave together the truth with his own flights of fancy?" {n}Ulfar smiles vindictively, with a viciousness utterly unbecoming of an Angel of the Emperor. Now it is Halbrandt's turn to blush.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「『お山の大将』ハルブラントのことを言ってんじゃないよな？あいつの詩は空想の戦闘と本物の戦闘がごっちゃになってるからなあ？」{n}ウルファーは皇帝の天使には全く似合わない、仕返しといわんばかりの悪辣な笑みを浮かべる。今度はハルブラントが顔を真っ赤にする番だ。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Será mejor Halbrandt el Fanfarrón, ¿no? "Pues en sus versos se suelen fundir realidad y fantasía"». {n}Ulfar sonríe con aire vengativo, destilando una maldad totalmente impropia de un ángel del Emperador. Ahora quien se ruboriza es Halbrandt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think you meant to say Halbrandt the Braggart, no? For his verses often weave together the truth with his own flights of fancy?" {n}Ulfar smiles vindictively, with a viciousness utterly unbecoming of an Angel of the Emperor. Now it is Halbrandt's turn to blush.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Será mejor Halbrandt el Fanfarrón, ¿no? "Pues en sus versos se suelen fundir realidad y fantasía"». {n}Ulfar sonríe con aire vengativo, destilando una maldad totalmente impropia de un ángel del Emperador. Ahora quien se ruboriza es Halbrandt.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Tu voulais sans doute dire "Halbrandt le Bravache", tant ses vers mêlent souvent ses propres chimères à la vérité. » {n}Ulfar se fend d'un sourire rancunier dont se dégage une cruauté qui ne sied guère à un ange de l'Empereur. C'est maintenant au tour d'Halbrandt de rougir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think you meant to say Halbrandt the Braggart, no? For his verses often weave together the truth with his own flights of fancy?" {n}Ulfar smiles vindictively, with a viciousness utterly unbecoming of an Angel of the Emperor. Now it is Halbrandt's turn to blush.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tu voulais sans doute dire "Halbrandt le Bravache", tant ses vers mêlent souvent ses propres chimères à la vérité. » {n}Ulfar se fend d'un sourire rancunier dont se dégage une cruauté qui ne sied guère à un ange de l'Empereur. C'est maintenant au tour d'Halbrandt de rougir.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr meintet sicher Halbrandt der Maulheld, richtig? Denn seine Verse vermengen oft die Wahrheit mit seiner eigenen Fantasie." {n}Ulfar lächelt siegesbewusst, mit einer Bosheit, die einem Engel des Imperator überhaupt nicht geziemt. Und nun ist es an Halbrandt, zu erröten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think you meant to say Halbrandt the Braggart, no? For his verses often weave together the truth with his own flights of fancy?" {n}Ulfar smiles vindictively, with a viciousness utterly unbecoming of an Angel of the Emperor. Now it is Halbrandt's turn to blush.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr meintet sicher Halbrandt der Maulheld, richtig? Denn seine Verse vermengen oft die Wahrheit mit seiner eigenen Fantasie." {n}Ulfar lächelt siegesbewusst, mit einer Bosheit, die einem Engel des Imperator überhaupt nicht geziemt. Und nun ist es an Halbrandt, zu erröten.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Sanırım Kibirli Halbrant demek istedin. Zira onun mısraları, hakikatle kendi hayallerini bir arada sunuyor." {n}Ulfar, İmparator'un Melekleri'ne yakışmayan bir kötülükle kindarca gülümsüyor. Bunun üzerine şimdi de Halbrandt kızarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think you meant to say Halbrandt the Braggart, no? For his verses often weave together the truth with his own flights of fancy?" {n}Ulfar smiles vindictively, with a viciousness utterly unbecoming of an Angel of the Emperor. Now it is Halbrandt's turn to blush.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sanırım Kibirli Halbrant demek istedin. Zira onun mısraları, hakikatle kendi hayallerini bir arada sunuyor." {n}Ulfar, İmparator'un Meleğine yakışmaz bir kötülükle kindarca gülümsüyor. Şimdi de Halbrandt kızarıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
